title: URF ISNT PATCHING STUCK US 31% OR 32%

replies.body:
this is the same with me
it patches upto 32% (1.18mb left) in the first half of the download
and the and error "update has failed" comes up and download pauses completely
Could you provide more details? Do you get an error message at 32% or does the patcher download speed just go down to 0kbps without any dialogue?
